lead_paragraph: Ohio State Coach Jim Tressel has agreed to contract revisions that will make him the highest-paid football coach in the Big Ten Conference. The university said that the revisions would be phased in this year and that Tressel’s compensation next year would be $3.5 million, an increase of more than $1 million annually.
